recent_messages.content:
Re-run the harsh real-life stress journey audit after remediations.

Hard constraints:
- DO NOT delegate to another debug agent.
- Read-only analysis + runtime journey simulation if needed.

Re-check scenarios:
1) fresh init -> onboarding -> command-less auto realign
2) invalid command fallback routing
3) todo/manifest lineage and ralph export under mixed field naming
4) governance return automation ack paths
5) repeated action updates and lifecycle consistency

Return format:
1) JOURNEY MATRIX (PASS/PARTIAL/FAIL)
2) REMAINING VIOLATIONS (if any)
3) PRODUCTION VERDICT (GO/NO-GO)
4) EVIDENCE
